title: Billy Gardell's Next Television Role | Mike Steele | 3WS Radio
text:
Billy Gardell's Next Television Role posted by Mike Steele - share 
Billy Gardell returns to television with a role in the new series "Sun Records" on the CMT Network. Billy plays Col. Tom Parker, rock and roll's first-ever manager. Parker was with Elvis Presley for many years. The TV series is about the 1950's record label when Elvis, Carl Perkins, Johnny Cash, Roy Orbison and Jerry Lee Lewis were all in Memphis. 
The show is Thursday night at 10:00 on CMT. Mike Steele - I love live music and watching hockey. Been a Steelers fan since birth! Lived in the South Hills a good part of my life. Mom & Dad have been married 50 years. I have two amazing sisters and I'm a proud uncle, too. This is my 2nd tenure at the studios - I did weekends at WDVE in the 1990's. After working in Austin, Texas for eight years, I returned to my hometown. Happy to be back in the Burgh! Contact
